passive.name: TOXIC SHOT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) TOXIC SHOT
                                Attacks deal 10 bonus magic damage ((8 +  × 2) + 20% ) on impact and an additional 10 magic damage ((8 +  × 2) + 9% ) each second for 4 seconds.

q.name: (Q) BLINDING DART
q.description:
(Q) BLINDING DART
 8s   75/80/85/90 
                                
                                
                                Deals 60 magic damage (60/110/160/210 + 55% ) and blinds the target for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.Attacks from blinded enemies will miss their target, dealing no damage and failing to apply on-hit effects.Range: 5.5.

w.name: (W) MOVE QUICK
w.description:
(W) MOVE QUICK
 17/16/15/14s   40 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Grants 15/20/25/30% Movement Speed if an enemy champion or structure has not damaged Teemo within the last 5 seconds.Active: Rolls a short distance forward and sprints (30/40/50/60% Movement Speed) for 3 seconds During this time, Move Quick's bonus is doubled and cannot be removed by damage.

e.name: (E) GUERILLA WARFARE
e.description:
(E) GUERILLA WARFARE
 25/23/21/19s   60 
                                
                                
                                After a delay, become Camouflaged. Moving outside of brush for more than 3/3.5/4/4.5 seconds ends this effect.Camouflage: Hide from champions by keeping them out of Teemo's detection radius. Enemy turrets reveal camouflaged units near them. Attacks and offensive abilities end Camouflage early.After exiting Camouflage, gain 30/40/50/60% Attack Speed for 3/4/5/6 seconds.

r.name: (R) NOXIOUS TRAP
r.description:
(R) NOXIOUS TRAP
 1s   75 
                                
                                
                                Place a mushroom trap that detonates when an enemy steps on it, dealing 125 magic damage (125/175/225 + 30% ) over 3 seconds and slowing by 30/40/50% for 3 seconds.Traps last for 2 minutes.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.
